title: So Rammus is basically some dude
body:
And by chance happens to become famous folklore by doing literally nothing intentional, and his response to this is ヽ(￣～￣　)ノ
10/10 best lore

replies.body:
Shuriman soldier A: OMG, RAMMUS HAS SAVED US BY DROPPING A TEMPLE ON THE ENEMY! 
Shuriman soldier B: PRAISE BE TO RAMMUS :D
Shuriman soldier C: Where did he go?
Shuriman soldier B: off to save more people who are in need I bet O.O 

{{champion:33}}: zzzzz
Well armadillos are rather carefree; almost ran a family of them over when I went to florida, they didn't even flinch, just waddled around to sniff the tires then wandered off into the forest.
When you are a creature that has lived with the likes of FloridaMan, nothing much can phase you.
Think of him as the Godzilla of Runeterra. Gamera might be more fitting, but whichever you grew up with.

Eh, Godzilla is a hell of a lot less passive, he's more "Right, you pissed me off for whatever reason- I'ma smash you, your neighborhood, your city, and even that other monster who coincidentally is also in my way."
https://brian.carnell.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/godzilla-fuck-this.gif
Almost spat out my coffee lmao 10/10
Lol, well this summed up everything.
Are you implying rammus doesnt do this to your team when he gets fed?
Reminds me of season 1 XD
I grew up with both! (' ')b
Seems pretty ok
His lore could be one giant "OK" and ppl would be fine with it.
here comes dat rammus

> [{quoted}](name=Big Lincoln,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4jvFAsMt,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-17T23:59:49.643+0000)
>
> here comes dat rammus

Oh sh*t waddup
Rammus is the Forrest Gump of League.
{{champion:33}} Now you roll just like me Lt. Dan.
I had a nice bowl of {{champion:33}} while reading his lore
You must be mistaken, that is ramen. You are thinking of an Egyptian ruler...
You must be mistaken, that is Ramses. You are thinking of the company that makes League...
You must be mistaken, that is Riot.  You are thinking of a male sheep.
BAA RAM EWE BAA RAM EWE
You must be mistaken, that is a ram.  You are thinking of the League game mode with the randomly selected champions in the Howling Abyss.
You must be mistaken, that is ARAM. You are thinking of a 70's punk band.
you must be mistaken, that is ramones. You are thinking of a thing that the Vancouver canucks fans did a few years ago
https://www.reddit.com/r/TheReligionOfRammus/
now all i wanna do is play rammus jungle and when someone thank me for a gank i will anwser them ZzZzz xD
Better than Amumu's lore.
am i the only one to find ramus to be just such a little cutie pie?
Same. I love the way he says "ok" when you pick him.  Almost as cute as {{champion:32}}
I just want to give Amumu a hug but now that makes me suicidal

Rammus is basically an armadillo-thingy that happens to be in the right place at the right time and becomes a Shuriman rockstar.
Role model.

The american dream.

Get famous by doing jackshit!

Yea I feel the same. I got excited for a minute that {{champion:33}} and {{champion:32}} were finally going to have backstories. The old lore was, "no one really knows..." The new lore is, "No one really knows, but there was a guy who saw him once."
look at this dood
His lore was the only one i actually read.{{champion:33}}
OK...

He didnht say OK!

He said Humm!

OMG!

Rammus is either prepping his food (by killing those insects) or looking for some sweet grub from a far distance. It seems like he can sniff out or sense whatever seems delicious to him from many miles. 

But yeah man he pretty much unintentionally saves people and it's funny.
ok
Rammus = Gintoki
ok
Ok
ok.
mhmm
